content: अश् {vI.v} {c5c} <ab>A.</ab> [अश्नुते, आनशे, आशिष्ट-आष्ट, अशिता-अष्टा, अशिष्यतेअक्ष्यते, अशितुं-अष्टुं, अशित-अष्ट] {@--1@} To pervade, fill completely, penetrate; खं प्रावृषेण्यैरिव चानशेऽब्दैः <ls>Bk. 2. 30</ls>; सदिगश्नुवानमिव विश्वमोजसा <ls>Ki. 12. 21</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 46</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 17.">65.</ls> {@--2@} To reach, go or come to, arrive at, attain to; सर्वमानंत्यमश्नुते <ls>Y. 1. 260.</ls> {@--3@} To get, gain, obtain, enjoy, experience; अत्युत्कटैः पापपुण्यैरिहैव फलमश्नुते <ls>H. 1. 83</ls>; उदयमस्तमयं च रघूद्वहादुभयमानशिरे वसुधाधिपाः <ls>R. 9. 9</ls>; न वेदफलमश्नुते <ls>Ms. 1. 109</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 149</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 46</ls>; अर्थज्ञ इत्सकलं भद्रमश्नुते <ls>Nir.</ls>; फलं दृशोरानशिरे महिष्यः <ls>N. 6. 43</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 4</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">5. 21</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 37</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">5. 14</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 19.</ls> {@--4@} To become master of; to master, to be able (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--5@} To heap, accumulate. WITH अनु {1} to reach, come up to. {2} to equal. --आ {1} to reach to. {2} to obtain, get. {3} to addict oneself to. --उद् {1} to reach to the top of. {2} to reach, obtain, get. {3} to be master of. --उप {1} to obtain, enjoy, acquire; न च लोकानुपाश्नुते <ls>Mb.</ls>; क्रियाफलमुपाश्नुते <ls>Ms. 6. 82</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 20</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 12.">81.</ls> {2} to become master of. --परि to reach, attain; fill competely, pervade. --प्र {1} to arrive at, reach, occupy, fill completely. {2} to fall to the lot of one (<ab>acc.</ab>). {vII.v} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (rarely A.) (अश्नाति, आशीत्, आश, अशिता, अशिष्यति, अशित) {@--1@} To eat, to consume; निवेद्य गुरवेऽ श्नीयात् <ls>Ms. 2. 51</ls>; अश्नीमहि वयं भिक्षां <ls>Bh. 3. 117.</ls> {@--2@} To taste, enjoy; यद्ददाति यदश्नाति तदेव धनिनो धनं <ls>H. 1. 164-165</ls>; अश्नंति दिव्यान् दिवि देवभोगान् <ls>Bg. 9. 20</ls>; प्रत्यक्षं फलमश्नंति कर्मणां <ls>Mb.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (आशयति) To feed, give to eat, cause to eat or drink (with <ab>acc.</ab> of person); आशयच्चामृतं देवान् <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 83</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">94</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">219</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">220</ls>; (for derivatives from the causal see under आ). --WITH अति to precede or surpass in eating. --उप to eat; taste, enjoy.
